I have noticed I only get around five to six launches until the game crashes. I already hit f-10 to turn off the temp gauge, is there any way to disable or remove this feature to stop the memory leak? Even turning it off I get a increase in memory use at every launch.

It is interferring massively with my enjoyment of the game. I am trying to design two vehicles for a mission I am planning and have to reload every 10-15 minutes as I test and tweak the designs.
